public static ActorFactory newInstance()

Returns:

create

public Actor create(java.util.Properties props)
Actors are created using the 'ActorClass' property to determine the class of the actor to use.
  • 'DBActor' - creates a DBActor Actor.
  • anything else - creates a BasicUser.


Parameters for all actors
  • 'ActorType' - type (mode) of the created Actor
  • 'ActorID' - ID of the created Actor

Parameters:
props - parameters for Actors
Returns:
newly created Actor
